name: Crab Crusher
description:
Crush the spy crabs and stop them from escaping into the ocean!

You play as the big crab and have to move your claw and crush the smaller crabs

They start digging out to the beach from a random spot and once they reach they surface, they start running to the surface.

Once they go past the ocean, they've escaped and you've lost one of your ten lives.

The big crab's claw (s) is controlled by your mouse and you close your claws together by clicking your left mouse button.

If a spy crab is caught between the claws when you pinch, it dies (F).

Made for Weekly Game Jame #162 (theme: Crabs)

Thanks To

  • Camcebra Games for spriting the spy crabs
  • finalbossblues for spriting the tileset used
